org.elasticsearch.river.jdbc

Class SQLService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.river.jdbc.SQLService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BulkAcknowledge

    public class SQLService
extends Object
implements BulkAcknowledge
    The SQL service class manages the SQL access to the JDBC connection.

                                           String riverName,
                                           String optype,

                                             throws SQLException
        Prepare statement for processing a river sync table
        Parameters:
        connection - the JDBC connection
        riverName - the name of the river
        optype - the operation type
        interval - the interval to cover, in milliseconds (back from current time)
        Returns:
        a preapred river table statement

        SQLException

      • nextRow

        public boolean nextRow(ResultSet result,
              RowListener listener)
                throws SQLException,
                       IOException
        Get next row and prepare the values for processing. The labels of each columns are used for the RowListener as paths for JSON object merging.
        Parameters:
        result - the result set
        listener - the listener
        Returns:
        true if row exists and was processed, false otherwise
        Throws:
        SQLException
        IOException

      • nextRiverTableRow

        public boolean nextRiverTableRow(ResultSet result,
                        RowListener listener)
                          throws SQLException,
                                 IOException
        Get next row from a river table. The river table contains embedded SQL which is executed.
        Parameters:
        result - the result set
        listener - the row listener
        Returns:
        true if there was a row being executed, false otherwise
        Throws:
        SQLException
        IOException
